ptolemy.backtrack.eclipse.plugin.editor

Class SemanticHighlightingReconciler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.backtrack.eclipse.plugin.editor.SemanticHighlightingReconciler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.jface.text.ITextInputListener, org.eclipse.jface.util.IPropertyChangeListener

    public class SemanticHighlightingReconciler
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.jface.util.IPropertyChangeListener, org.eclipse.jface.text.ITextInputListener
    Reconciler for Ptolemy semantic highlighting.

    This is the main class for Ptolemy semantic highlighting. It parses the Java source in the editor on-the-fly, and add Ptolemy semantic coloring to the presentation.

    Since:
    Ptolemy II 5.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Thomas Feng
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Red (tfeng)
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Red (tfeng)
